name: Sample Case 2: Collection Account Missing DOFD
description: A de-identified example showing a collection account without a reported Date of First Delinquency, making it impossible to verify proper removal timing.
raw_text:
COLLECTION ACCOUNT

Reporting Agency: TransUnion

Furnisher: NATIONAL RECOVERY SERVICES
Original Account: REGIONAL MEDICAL CENTER
Account Type: Medical Collection

Date Account Opened: 08/22/2024
Last Reported: 10/15/2024
Account Status: Collection

Original Balance: $892
Current Balance: $892

Comments: Placed for collection

Scheduled to remain on file until: 08/2031

No Date of First Delinquency reported.

dofd.source_text: No Date of First Delinquency reported.

estimated_removal_date.source_text: Scheduled to remain on file until: 08/2031

notes: This sample shows a common issue with collection accounts - no DOFD is reported, but the account shows a recent 'date opened' (2024). Without the DOFD, consumers cannot verify whether the removal date (2031) is correct. The original debt may have become delinquent years earlier.
